mapper.insert: insert into organization (id, organization_id, name, parent_id, enabled, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{organizationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{enabled,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update organization set organization_id = #{organizationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, organization_id, name, parent_id, enabled, create_time, update_time from organization
